body: Goddamn it. Why is it always some flavor of NTR? What a fucking waste of talent.

This would be better if only she's a virgin but no, she wanted to forget about him so she tried to love some other man thus she gave her chastity to that guy and to make it worse looks like she kept on changing men as she's never happy with them, here's the statement: "this gaping hole opened in my heart and I kept...covering it up". This author doesn't like sweet vanilla. There's always some twist.
Aahh nice, it's refreshing. So many NTR from this author (Nagare Ippon)
Just wait a month for kaname date chapter...
